title: Revert announcer to normal?
body: Is there any way to revert the announcer voice in game to normal?  The thresh one bugs me a lot and has been throwing me off my game.  >_<

replies.body:
No worries! We included a neat little feature with this patch so that you can turn off the Dark Star event announcer voice in-game.

https://i.gyazo.com/a6b3d7817eda5c54133daa5920ea9e1d.png
